Waltham.Old Watertown High School: Old Watertown High School is a historic school building at 341 Mount Auburn Street in Watertown, Massachusetts, USA. The ​3 1⁄2 story brick building was built in 1913 by local architect Charles Brigham. Now an assisted living facility named Brigham House, the English Revival structure is one of Watertown's most imposing public buildings, standing about one mile east of Watertown center. When built it first served as the city's high school, but was converted to a junior high school in 1925, a role it served until the late 1980s.
